Advanced Measurement Capabilities

JEBS combines computer vision, AI analysis, and precision measurement technology to deliver comprehensive blade inspection solutions.

Multi-Point Measurement

Simultaneous measurement of critical blade dimensions including F, G, H, J, K, L, M, and N points with automatic pass/fail determination.

  • • Vertical offset measurements
  • • Angular measurements
  • • Dimensional analysis
  • • CAD comparison

Computer Vision AI

Advanced machine learning algorithms automatically detect measurement points and calculate precise dimensions from digital imagery.

  • • Automated feature detection
  • • Edge detection algorithms
  • • Sub-pixel accuracy
  • • Adaptive lighting compensation

Quality Assurance

Automated acceptance criteria validation with configurable tolerances and comprehensive reporting for quality control documentation.

  • • Configurable tolerance ranges
  • • Automated pass/fail status
  • • Detailed inspection reports
  • • Traceability documentation

Precision Measurement Technology

JEBS leverages cutting-edge computer vision and measurement algorithms to deliver aerospace-grade precision in blade inspection.

✓ F: 1.35mm (Pass)
✓ K: 1.96mm (Pass)
✗ H: 1.26mm (Fail)
✓ G: 19.49mm (Pass)
